NINJA

WARRIOR
ALCHEMIST
GEISHA
TANUKI
SHOGUN
SHOGUNSON
DAIMYO
GENERAL
BROGUN
BROGUNSON
column8:
Hayato 
Yuki 
Ōshiro Mugen
Takuma 
Aiko 
Kuma
Shogun
Ryūnosuke
Yabu
Okkoto
Noboru
Masaru
column10:
1) Mugen leads Noboru to the old temple where Ryūnosuke is hidden
2) We recognize it as the place where Yabu once held Takuma captive 
3) Noboru orders Masaru to kill Ryūnosuke. Mugen has to watch.
4) After the deed is done the traitors leave Mugen with the dead heir.
5) The rest of the team are held in a hidden prison
6) They can free themselves and cut their way to Mugen.
8) Mugen is glad to see them, but he has failed the Shogun and cannot carry on.
9) To take responsibility and reclaim his honor, he commits ritual suicide.
10) Striken by the loss of their leader and friend, the team escapes the monastery.
Mugen leads Noboru and Masaru onto the monastery square, where they are greeted by Ryūnosuke. Noboru breaks his promise and has Ryūnosuke killed.
Remember how you told me about patience, Mugen-sensei? Let us see how patient you can be.
column12: 还记得曾经教过我要忍耐吗？现在倒要看看无限老师你怎么忍耐。

column10: Masaru, do not waste your words.  Important things are about to happen.
column12: 真申，别废话。马上要办大事了。

column9: meets them on the temple square
column10: Noboru-sama, Mugen-sensei, Masaru-san. What a pleasant surprise!
column12: 昇大人，无限老师，真申兄弟。你们怎么来了！

column10: Dear nephew, you cannot know how delighted I am to see you.
column12: 侄儿啊，你不知道我看到你有多高兴。

column10: You bring good news, I hope? Has Kage-sama been defeated?
column12: 是有好消息了吧？影大人被打败了吗？

column10: I am afraid matters have changed quite drastically, nephew.
column12: 很遗憾，侄儿。事态恐怕和你想象的天差地别。

column9: Mugen runs to Ryūnosuke and kneels beside him
column10: I have failed you, my lord...
column12: 恕属下失职，龙之介大人……

column9: Turns to Mugen and makes a step
column10: What is the meaning of this?

column9: dies right in front of Mugen

column10: Masaru, go prepare for our departure.
Why? Why did he have to die? What madness possesses you?
column12: 为什么？为什么非杀他不可？你到底在发什么疯？！

column10: This … peace we have now, it is not our way. We are men of the sword. My brother is blind.
column12: 现在拥有的所谓和平，不是我想看到的。我们明明是为战而生的人。兄长他却看不到。

column9: turns to Mugen and makes a step
column10: You of all people should understand. Every man choses his duty. Without duty, life has no purpose.
column12: 你作为武士肯定明白。武士要有使命。没有使命，生命毫无意义。

column10: And it is my duty to lead Japan back to her true glory.
column12: 我的使命即是让日本找回真正的辉煌。

column9: throws knife at Mugen's feet at the end
column10: I wonder, now that you have failed in your duty … will you do, what must be done?
column12: 既然未能完成使命……你还有什么用？知道该怎么做吧？

column10: Farewell Mugen. We will not see each other again.
column12: 永别了，无限。我们不会再见面了。

column10: Hayato, Yuki and Takuma have been confined to separeate cages. Aiko is nowhere to be seen. They plan their escape.
column12: Hayato, Yuki and Takuma have been confined to separeate cages. Aiko is nowhere to be seen. They plan their escape.

column10: No … they took Aiko-san away … where did they take her?
column12: 不好……他们把爱子姐带走了……要带她去哪？

column10: Such is the extent of his treachery. What will he do to the Shogun's son …
column12: 没想到做到如此地步。他到底想对将军的儿子做什么……

column10: … Mugen … don't you dare die now. I have to get out … damn it … DAMN IT!
column12: ……无限……千万别死。我必须出去……该死……畜生！

column10: Hayato tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Hayato tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: Walls are too slick to climb … damn!
column12: 石壁太滑爬不上去……该死！

column10: Hayato tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Hayato tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: Guard looks nervous. Could provoke him …
column12: 守卫看起来很紧张。可以适当刺激他一下……

column10: Hayato tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Hayato tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: There's places to hide here. That has to be good for something!
column12: 牢里有能藏身的地方。可以利用一下！

column10: Yuki tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Yuki tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: There's a ledge below … no, you can't get out. Stupid!
column12: 下面有个平台……不行，得先想办法出笼子。笨蛋！

column10: Yuki tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Yuki tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: Take back rat's tooth from that samurai! No, have to get out first, stupid!
column12: 要把“鼠牙”从武士那里拿回来！不行，得先想办法出笼子。笨蛋！

column10: Yuki tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Yuki tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: The samurai has evil eyes. They don't like empty cages.
column12: 武士的眼睛很贼。笼子空了肯定会被他发现。

column10: Takuma tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Takuma tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: I have my cane. I have my leg. Both no use without ammunition.
column12: 木腿在，手杖也在，但没有弹药也无济于事。

column10: Takuma tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Takuma tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: Hmm, I wonder where Kuma is now.
column12: 嗯，不知道小熊现在在哪。

column10: Takuma tries to think up an escape plan.
column12: Takuma tries to think up an escape plan.

column10: I could help them both, had I anything to load my rifle with.
column12: 我能帮他俩逃脱，只要枪里有子弹就行。

column10: The overseer partrols through the prison and periodically checks the cells of Hayato, Takuma and Yuki.
column12: The overseer partrols through the prison and periodically checks the cells of Hayato, Takuma and Yuki.
没有武器你什么也干不了。

column10: You stay right where I can see you.
Still clinging to life, are we?
You will die in here, old fool.
column12: 你早晚死在这里，老傻帽。

column10: None of your friends can reach you here.
Not so clever now, are we?
column12: 你不是很会耍小聪明吗，来啊？
小小年纪就学着杀人……真是贱。

column10: Your little dagger is mine now.
column12: 你那把小刀我就收下了。

column10: Takuma calls Kuma. The pet arrives shortly after, with a bag of pellets in its jaws.
column12: Takuma calls Kuma. The pet arrives shortly after, with a bag of pellets in its jaws.

column10: Kuma! Hehe, you came! And what's that in your mouth?
column12: 小熊！嘿嘿，你来了！你嘴里衔的是什么？

column10: Kuma! Hehe, you came! And what did you throw me just now?
column12: 小熊！嘿嘿，你来了！你刚刚扔给我的是什么？

column10: A bag of ammunition. My thanks. Maybe there's still hope left.
column12: 原来是弹药包，非常感谢。真是雪中送炭啊。

column10: Takuma shoots free the vine that lets Hayato escape from his cage.
column12: Takuma shoots free the vine that lets Hayato escape from his cage.

column10: What the … no idea how he did that, but I'll take it.
column12: 什么情况……虽然不知道是怎么做到的，总之谢谢了。

column10: Takuma shoots down Yuki's cage. She crashes into the ledge below her and escapes.
column12: Takuma shoots down Yuki's cage. She crashes into the ledge below her and escapes.

column10: Yuki steals her knife back from the overseer
column12: Yuki steals her knife back from the overseer

column10: Yes! Fast and sharp, just like me!
column12: 我的小刀，灵活又锋利，就像我一样！

column10: Once team members have escaped, there's a limited time before the patroling overseer will check on them and notice that they are missing.
column12: Once team members have escaped, there's a limited time before the patroling overseer will check on them and notice that they are missing.

column10: OK. Have to be fast. Overseer's on patrol, and he's checking the cells.
column12: 好，动作要快。有狱卒在巡查，很快就会发现牢房空了。

column10: Quick! The samurai with the evil eyes, he'll see that you're gone.
column12: 快点！那个武士眼睛很贼的，很快就会发现我逃跑啦。

column10: Another team member opens Hayato's cage.

column12: Another team member opens Hayato's cage.

column10: Quick! We have to get to the others!
Another team member opens Yuki's cage.
column12: Another team member opens Yuki's cage.

column10: Thank you! The others need our help!
column12: 谢谢！其他人也需要我们帮忙！

column10: Another team member opens Takuma's cage.
column12: Another team member opens Takuma's cage.

column10: Ah, thank you. We have no time to lose.
column12: 啊，谢谢。抓紧时间去救其他人把。

column10: The prison overseer notices that a team member has escaped.
column12: The prison overseer notices that a team member has escaped.

column10: Raise the alarm! Someone escaped! Secure the exit! Let no one leave the prison!
column12: 快发警报！有人逃跑了！看住出口！别让任何人逃出监狱！

column10: Hayato has left the prison area behind.
column12: Hayato has left the prison area behind.

column10: I'll kill that Noboru and his brat.
column12: 我要杀了昇和他的小崽子。

column10: Yuki has left the prison area behind.
column12: Yuki has left the prison area behind.

column10: Quickly! Aiko-san and Mugen-san need us!
column12: 快点儿！快去救爱子姐和无限大哥！

column10: Takuma has left the prison area behind.
column12: Takuma has left the prison area behind.

column10: Twice now I had to escape a prison on this mountain.
column12: 这是我第二次从这座山上越狱了。

column10: Takuma tells Hayato and Yuki about the statues that open secret passages.
column12: Takuma tells Hayato and Yuki about the statues that open secret passages.

column10: Hmm, I just remembered. The crane statues here open secret passages.
column12: 嗯，我还记得，这里的仙鹤雕像能开启密道。

column10: Hope this isn't one of your jokes, old man.
column12: 希望这次你不是在开玩笑，老爷子。
你怎么知道的，琢磨师父？

column10: Just keep it in mind. We need every advantage we can get now.
column12: 你们只管记住就好。现在必须利用一切有利条件。

column10: After escaping the prison, the team moves into the main compound of the monastery. Geisha is being interrogated there.
column12: After escaping the prison, the team moves into the main compound of the monastery. Geisha is being interrogated there.

column10: Hayato hears a guard ordering another to search the underbrush.
column12: Hayato hears a guard ordering another to search the underbrush.

column10: Look at her. Have you ever seen such beauty?
column12: 看看她，你见过这么美的人儿吗？

column10: We should draw lots to see who will have her first, or it will end in a fight again.
column12: 应该抽签决定谁先和她那啥，要不又得打起来。

column10: Touch me, and you will die a slow, agonizing death.
column12: 敢碰我的人，都会受漫长痛苦折磨而死哦。

column10: Do you think there's poison in her body? I heard stories once …
column12: 她不会身上带毒吧？我听过这种传闻……

column10: That's what they are just stories. You can't have poison in your body ... can you?
column12: 传闻而已吧。身上怎么可能带毒……对吧？

column10: You will know soon, if one of you is fool enough to find out.
column12: 你们哪个蠢材敢来试试的话，不就知道了么。

column10: Let's just stick to questions, for now.
The team finds Aiko in a guarded cage. They kill the guards and free her.
column12: The team finds Aiko in a guarded cage. They kill the guards and free her.
爱子姐!他们没伤到你吧?

column10: I'm fine. We must find Mugen, quickly!
column12: 我没事。去找无限大哥吧，快！

column10: Hayato hears a guard ordering another to search the underbrush.
column12: Hayato hears a guard ordering another to search the underbrush.

column10: We have to find her! Search the area!
column12: 必须找到她！快去附近搜！

column10: Hush, little trap. Did they hurt you?
column12: 嘘，欢迎回来，他们伤到你了没?

column10: Better than nothing. Where'd they put my weapons?
column12: 总比什么都没有强。我的武器到底藏到哪了？

column10: A monk is arguing with a guard to defend the female temple servants.
column12: A monk is arguing with a guard to defend the female temple servants.

column10: We will do as we please.
They have done you no wrong!
You can beg all you want.
I … I will not let you touch them …
Teh … who are you to stop me?
Hayato finds Mugen, but everyone needs to be there.
column12: Hayato finds Mugen, but everyone needs to be there.

column10: Hrm … have to get the others …
column12: 嗯……得让其他人也都过来……

column10: Yuki finds Mugen, but everyone needs to be there.
column12: Yuki finds Mugen, but everyone needs to be there.

column10: Aiko finds Mugen, but everyone needs to be there.
column12: Aiko finds Mugen, but everyone needs to be there.

column10: He is not thinking clearly. We need the others here.
column12: 他现在头脑不清楚。得把其他人都找来。

column10: Takuma finds Mugen, but everyone needs to be there.
column12: Takuma finds Mugen, but everyone needs to be there.

column10: He is trapped in his own mind. We must gather everyone here.
column12: 他现在思绪混乱。必须把所有人都找来。

column10: The team hears from Mugen what has happened. Since he has failed his master, he wishes to commit Seppuku, and instructs the team to continue their mission.
column12: The team hears from Mugen what has happened. Since he has failed his master, he wishes to commit Seppuku, and instructs the team to continue their mission.

column10: You … you are all still alive …
My love what happened to the Shogun's son? Did Noboru kill him?
column12: 无限大哥，龙之介大人怎么了？是昇杀了他吗？

column10: We'll make him pay for this! Come with us.
column12: 要让他血债血偿！我们走。

column10: I ... I can accompany you no longer.
column12: 我……不能再与你们同行了。

column9: knows that Mugen will commit suicide

column10: I have failed Ryūnosuke ... I have failed my Shogun … now I must beg your forgiveness as well.
column12: 我没能……没能保护龙之介大人……现在必须给大家一个交代。

column10: When a samurai has been shamed ... he thinks he has to …
column12: 武士的名誉受辱之时……为了一雪前耻，只能……

column10: No! We can't let him! I … I don't want him to die!
column12: 不！不能不管！我……不想让他死！

column10: We feel the same, Yuki-chan. But don't you see? To die like a samurai … it is the only thing left to him. We must show our respect, for we can do nothing else.
column12: 我们也不想啊，友希姑娘。但没有办法，用武士的方式死去……是留给他最后的尊严了。除了尊重他的选择我们也无能为力了。

column10: … do you wish me to join you?
My love … I would be honoured … but they need you most of all.
column12: 我的爱人……谢谢你……但大家还需要你。

column10: Then let me make you one final gift. A secret, meant only for you …
column12: 那让我送你最后一件礼物。一个只对你讲的秘密……

column10: … ah … something ends, something begins. It is as it should be.
column12: ……啊……这就是所谓的有终便有始么。世道本该如此。

column9: picks up the blade Noboru gave him

column10: What you said …  I … I'm glad we met. It was an honour, fighting by your side.
column12: 要怎么说……我……很高兴能认识你。很荣幸能与您并肩战斗。

column9: stops when she hears Takuma's voice, breaks down

readies the blade
speaks death poem
column10: Falling ill on a journey … my dreams go wandering … over withered fields.
column12: 旅途罹病……荒原驰骋……梦魂萦。

column9: cuts his belly, takes his time, finally collapses
Geisha leaves first, Ninja follows, then Takuma and Yuki
column10: Death has found him. Let us leave.
Having left the main plaza, now outside the main monastery gate.
column12: Having left the main plaza, now outside the main monastery gate.

column10: We are not safe yet. Let us leave this place.
column12: 我们也还没脱离险境，赶紧离开这里。

column10: Hayato is filled with rage. Aiko keeps him in line
column12: Hayato is filled with rage. Aiko keeps him in line
冷静下来，隼人兄。该做的事还没做完。

column10: Hayato is filled with rage. Aiko keeps him in line
column12: Hayato is filled with rage. Aiko keeps him in line

column10: Not now, Yuki-chan. There is no time for grief.
column12: 友希小妹，这样可不行。现在还不是悲伤的时候。

column10: Hayato takes his Ninjato off a dead or unconcious enemy. (also works with Shuriken)
column12: Hayato takes his Ninjato off a dead or unconcious enemy. (also works with Shuriken)

column10: A temple servant is begging a guard for mercy.
column12: A temple servant is begging a guard for mercy.

column10: You are mine, woman. Now kneel!
A guard shots a monk and two temple servants one after the other.
column12: A guard shots a monk and two temple servants one after the other.

column10: Hush, Yuki-chan. There is nothing we could have done.
column12: 嘘，友希姑娘。我们已经尽力了。

column10: We must wait until an opportunity presents itself. It will give us time to recover our strength. For now, I suggest we leave this awful place.
column12: 我们需要时间来恢复力量，同时等待机会。现在，先离开这个残酷的地方吧。
